artist: 3MA - Ballake Sissoko, Driss El Maloumi & Rajery
title: Anarouz (LP)
info: 3MA is the meeting of three string-instrument virtuosi, emblematic of their countries in Africa, but also of generous artists who share a musical passion, a reciprocal dialogue and a beautiful friendship. This new album bears witness to their wonderful connection and mature experience. Percussionist Khalid Kouhen joins in on two tracks to add delicate pulses with his Pakistani percussions and Indian tablas and on two other tracks we can even hear Rajery, Driss and Ballak? singing. But for the rest of the record, the string instruments reign and weave their magic alone.
label: Mad Minute Music - MDC

title: Vaki (LP)
info: Teea Aarnio is a transdisciplinary music artist ? sonic poet, composer, musician, contemporary vocal artist, storyteller, educator, sound designer, improviser, visual artist, movement artist, creative. She is a practitioner of soundpainting improvisation and she worked as a dance artist for 10 years. Her background as a dancer and with embodiment practises can be felt in her art's sonic resonance; her musical expression is inspired by life force, different languages, and the transformative dialogue with different beings and art forms. Teea Aarnio has worked in various projects in Finland and internationally. Themes of biodiversity and cultural diversity, and the dialogue between the seen and unseen, are present in her work.
label: Eclipse Music
